quote: I've done many things that I thought I would never dare to do because they were sins. But I didn't realize then that the consequence of sin is that you have to trample on other people.
quote_letters: IVE DONE MANY THINGS THAT I THOUGHT I WOULD NEVER DARE TO DO BECAUSE THEY WERE SINS BUT I DIDNT REALIZE THEN THAT THE CONSEQUENCE OF SIN IS THAT YOU HAVE TO TRAMPLE ON OTHER PEOPLE
